name: Bunny Hopper
description:
The Bunnyhopper is a 2d platformer with pixel art and a focus on simple top down combat. It’s set in a dystopian fantasy world with mutated monstrosities. This was a game jam project that we never really had the opportunity to publish, but we’re happy to release it now. We hope you enjoy!

Controls:

W A S D - To Move

Space / Left Click - To Shoot
